TextBlock.Text: COLEUS: The presence of specimens frozen in this glacier from the lost planet suggests the species was not native to this planet, but rather, displaced and sent here from the planet destroyed by <color=lightblue>Dark Bramble.</color>
MELORAE: We suspect the live specimens' terrifying bioelectricity was more likely an evolution of self-defense against predators on their home planet, rather than an adaptation to this planet.

PLUME: These lifeforms must be very adept to have taken to this planet so well! How admirable they were able to thrive to such a degree on an alien planet. Though they may lack wisdom, their resilience inspires me much.
